subs.text: My developer account is now unblocked! As soon as I transfer over the @fullyjabbedCA project to that account, I’ll get to work on on adding support for triple- and quadruple-jab percentages.
subs.rawText: My developer account is now unblocked! As soon as I transfer over the @fullyjabbedCA project to that account, I’ll get to work on on adding support for triple- and quadruple-jab percentages.

subs.text: Count me as a part-owner of TSS Rovers Football Club. I bought exactly one share, and if I lose my investment, so be it. This feels like something I want to be a part of with a tie back to my home province. Go Rovers Go! @SOTR_Vancouver @swanguardians [link]
subs.rawText: Count me as a part-owner of TSS Rovers Football Club. I bought exactly one share, and if I lose my investment, so be it. This feels like something I want to be a part of with a tie back to my home province. Go Rovers Go! @SOTR_Vancouver @swanguardians https://t.co/zfNZAnUsY5

subs.text: I’ll be giving away my season ticket, if indeed that’s the perk I get, hopefully earmarked for youths to attend.
subs.rawText: I’ll be giving away my season ticket, if indeed that’s the perk I get, hopefully earmarked for youths to attend.

subs.text: If there’s any other sports club that has a 49% fan ownership model in Canada, especially if it has a youth team, and even more especially if it helps support young women and girls in athletics, please let me know. I want to be a part of that.
subs.rawText: If there’s any other sports club that has a 49% fan ownership model in Canada, especially if it has a youth team, and even more especially if it helps support young women and girls in athletics, please let me know. I want to be a part of that.

subs.text: The 6th wave of the pandemic feels like the “everybody’s going to eventually get COVID-19 and if not die from it right away, then at least slowly over time as you keep getting it year after year” phase, but it’s still not the “tell your crushes you’re in love with them” phase.
subs.rawText: The 6th wave of the pandemic feels like the “everybody’s going to eventually get COVID-19 and if not die from it right away, then at least slowly over time as you keep getting it year after year” phase, but it’s still not the “tell your crushes you’re in love with them” phase.

subs.text: @uncleweed He won me over when he kept the take with his cat entering the frame in one of his videos about transit during the pandemic. It felt like a “You know what, kitty? I love you, and this video wouldn’t be perfect without you” moment.
subs.rawText: @uncleweed He won me over when he kept the take with his cat entering the frame in one of his videos about transit during the pandemic. It felt like a “You know what, kitty? I love you, and this video wouldn’t be perfect without you” moment.

subs.text: I regret not announcing my candidacy to be appointed councillor for Spadina-Fort York sooner. I would be a single-issue councillor, advocating for organics pickup citywide (including for residents living in apartments and condominiums). [link]
subs.rawText: I regret not announcing my candidacy to be appointed councillor for Spadina-Fort York sooner. I would be a single-issue councillor, advocating for organics pickup citywide (including for residents living in apartments and condominiums). https://t.co/omcsD1iyIi

subs.text: Dick Vitale is on my list of Good Richards.
subs.rawText: Dick Vitale is on my list of Good Richards.

subs.text: When the TTC replaces the Scarborough RT, can, I dunno, can I have it? I know it’d be a lot of work to take care of, but, I dunno, I kind of want it. [link]
subs.rawText: When the TTC replaces the Scarborough RT, can, I dunno, can I have it? I know it’d be a lot of work to take care of, but, I dunno, I kind of want it. https://t.co/N9ZnibOnEr

subs.text: What if, and hear me out on this, how about instead of demolishing the whole thing, we keep the section between Lawrence East and Scarborough Centre (or, let’s say, Midland), and the TTC just gives it to me. I’ll automate the system and maintain it. Deal? [link]
subs.rawText: What if, and hear me out on this, how about instead of demolishing the whole thing, we keep the section between Lawrence East and Scarborough Centre (or, let’s say, Midland), and the TTC just gives it to me. I’ll automate the system and maintain it. Deal? https://t.co/XD3IWUrgrG

subs.text: Uh, assuming I don’t take on any of its debt. And after I crowdfund millions of dollars for keeping that part of the system up. And set up a charitable foundation to keep it funded.
subs.rawText: Uh, assuming I don’t take on any of its debt. And after I crowdfund millions of dollars for keeping that part of the system up. And set up a charitable foundation to keep it funded.

subs.text:
@hankgreen I’ll unfollow someone if their last [x] amount of tweets are about a subject that’s wearing me out. Hopefully someone will RT them into my stream.

I’ll unfollow mean people that I don’t learn anything from. That said, because you’re mean isn’t a sufficient reason to unfollow.
subs.rawText:
@hankgreen I’ll unfollow someone if their last [x] amount of tweets are about a subject that’s wearing me out. Hopefully someone will RT them into my stream.

I’ll unfollow mean people that I don’t learn anything from. That said, because you’re mean isn’t a sufficient reason to unfollow.

subs.text: I’m not the only greying white guy who came here alone on transit. I’m keeping an eye on him, though that makes me wonder: Who’s keeping an eye on me?
subs.rawText: I’m not the only greying white guy who came here alone on transit. I’m keeping an eye on him, though that makes me wonder: Who’s keeping an eye on me?

subs.text: He did the same thing I was doing there, which was not much. Just there to listen, as far as I could tell.
subs.rawText: He did the same thing I was doing there, which was not much. Just there to listen, as far as I could tell.

subs.text: Events should have an “onlies” section so we can know who else is there and not waiting for someone to join them and whom it’s OK to try to make friends with.
subs.rawText: Events should have an “onlies” section so we can know who else is there and not waiting for someone to join them and whom it’s OK to try to make friends with.

subs.text: This might be the last Duke-UNC game I watch as a fan of the Blue Devils. The Coach K era is over after this year, and so with it, the end of an era of cheering for an NCAA basketball team.
subs.rawText: This might be the last Duke-UNC game I watch as a fan of the Blue Devils. The Coach K era is over after this year, and so with it, the end of an era of cheering for an NCAA basketball team.

subs.text: Back-and-forth basketball. I couldn’t ask for anything more.
subs.rawText: Back-and-forth basketball. I couldn’t ask for anything more.
